Mission Orders

The insane prions are rising up in the Crypt.

Kill the {@LinkCreature:37#160#prion njalvars} and {@LinkCreature:37#170#helgevars}, and {@LinkCreature:37#180#tuwangi conscripts} and {@LinkCreature:37#190#bombers}.

Report to Coordinator Taira when mission is complete.
Youâ€™ve earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
